import React, { useState } from 'react'; import Button from '@material-ui/core/Button'; const Professional = () => { const [edu,setEdu] = useState(false); const addEducation = () => { var formC = document.getElementById('collage-form'); var display = formC.classList.contains('d-none'); var form = document.getElementById('school-form'); var display = form.classList.contains('d-none'); var schbtn = document.getElementById('sch_btn'); var display = schbtn.classList.contains('d-none'); var clgbtn = document.getElementById('clg_btn'); var display = clgbtn.classList.contains('d-none'); if(display === true){ schbtn.classList.remove('d-none') clgbtn.classList.remove('d-none') form.classList.remove('d-none') formC.classList.remove('d-none') } else{ schbtn.classList.add('d-none') clgbtn.classList.add('d-none') form.classList.add('d-none') formC.classList.add('d-none') } } const addSchool = () => { var form = document.getElementById('school-form'); var display = form.classList.contains('d-none'); if(display === true){ form.classList.remove('d-none') } else{ form.classList.add('d-none') } } const addCollage = () => { var formC = document.getElementById('collage-form'); var display = formC.classList.contains('d-none'); if(display === true){ formC.classList.remove('d-none') } else{ formC.classList.add('d-none') } } const testEvent = () => { var test = document.getElementsByClassName('div-hide') var hide = test.classList.contains('d-none') if(hide === true){ test.classList.remove('d-none') } else{ test.classList.add('d-none') } } const addWork = () =>{ var formW = document.getElementById('work-form'); var display = formW.classList.contains('d-none'); if(display === true){ formW.classList.remove('d-none') } else{ formW.classList.add('d-none') } } return ( <>
